Year fitness craze fails to boost retail sales as consumer spending flounders]]></title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~3/yehOmWQt3Sg/fitness-craze-equipment-gym-wear-spending-retail-sales-growth-uk-businesses-economy</link><description><a href="https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920352/fitness-craze-equipment-gym-wear-spending-retail-sales-growth-uk-businesses-economy"><img src="http://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/22/590x/920352_1.jpg"/></a><br /><br />PUMPED up spending on gym wear and fitness equipment could not prevent UK retail sales sagging in January. Concerns mounted that cash-strapped consumers will struggle to power economic growth after official figures showed sales volumes edging up by just 0.1 per cent from the previous month, when they declined by 1.4 per cent.<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~4/yehOmWQt3Sg" height="1" width="1" DEBT CRISIS: Borrowing soars to €2.2TRILLION sparking Eurozone fears]]></title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~3/OUEe-UDSSEg/Italy-five-star-elections-eurozone-debt-borrowing-crash-EU</link><description><a href="https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/919956/Italy-five-star-elections-eurozone-debt-borrowing-crash-EU"><img src="http://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/22/590x/919956_1.jpg"/></a><br /><br />ITALY is sitting on a pile of public debt worth €2,256.1 billion after adding a staggering €36.6 billion between 2016 and 2017. The fourth largest economy in the eurozone has amassed a pile of debt that has grown from €2,137 billion at the end of 2014 to €2,256.1bn in 2017.<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~4/OUEe-UDSSEg" height="1" width="1" But what exactly is Litepal and when it is set to be launched? <img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~4/OCwAKTCnyTQ" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><comments>https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920107/Litecoin-news-Litepal-what-is-Litepal-when-does-Litepal-launch-Charlie-Lee-Litepay#comments</comments><pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 20:56:00 +0000</pubDate><guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920107/Litecoin-news-Litepal-what-is-Litepal-when-does-Litepal-launch-Charlie-Lee-Litepay</guid><feedburner:origLink>https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920107/Litecoin-news-Litepal-what-is-Litepal-when-does-Litepal-launch-Charlie-Lee-Litepay</feedburner:origLink></item><item><title><![CDATA[Bitcoin news: Will cryptocurrencies be made illegal in 2018?]]></title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~3/zm9MdmKA5F4/Bitcoin-news-will-cryptocurrencies-be-made-illegal-2018-Crypto-news</link><description><a href="https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920062/Bitcoin-news-will-cryptocurrencies-be-made-illegal-2018-Crypto-news"><img src="http://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/22/590x/920062_1.jpg"/></a><br /><br />BITCOIN and other cryptocurrencies are under greater scrutiny than ever before with fears of a regulatory crackdown from countries including India, South Korea and China. But will cryptocurrencies be made illegal in 2018?<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~4/zm9MdmKA5F4" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><comments>https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920062/Bitcoin-news-will-cryptocurrencies-be-made-illegal-2018-Crypto-news#comments</comments><pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 19:10:00 +0000</pubDate><guid src="http://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/22/590x/920027_1.jpg"/></a><br /><br />THE price of Litecoin was up by 30 percent on Wednesday ahead of its ‘hard fork’ launch, but what is Litecoin alt=""/></description><comments>https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920027/Litecoin-fork-Litecoin-Cash-hard-fork-crypto-token-spilt-when-will-Litecoin-spilt#comments</comments><pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb isPermaLink="false">https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920027/Litecoin-fork-Litecoin-Cash-hard-fork-crypto-token-spilt-when-will-Litecoin-spilt</guid><feedburner:origLink>https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920027/Litecoin-fork-Litecoin-Cash-hard-fork-crypto-token-spilt-when-will-Litecoin-spilt</feedburner:origLink></item><item><title><![CDATA[Bitcoin price prediction: Will 2018 be the worst year yet for cryptocurrency?]]></title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~3/UjcowrlXAFs/Bitcoin-price-prediction-2018-cryptocurrency-crypto-news</link><description><a href="https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920003/Bitcoin-price-prediction-2018-cryptocurrency-crypto-news"><img src="http://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/22/590x/920003_1.jpg"/></a><br /><br />BITCOIN suffered a crashing blow in 2018 when it plunged in value, first in January and then again this month. The digital token has not recovered from its December high of nearly $20,000 and is still down 50 percent in value from two months ago. Will 2018 be the worst year yet for the the cryptocurrency?<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/daily-express-finance-news/~4/UjcowrlXAFs" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><comments>https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920003/Bitcoin-price-prediction-2018-cryptocurrency-crypto-news#comments</comments><pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 15:53:00 +0000</pubDate><guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920003/Bitcoin-price-prediction-2018-cryptocurrency-crypto-news</guid><feedburner:origLink>https://www.express.co.uk/finance/city/920003/Bitcoin-price-prediction-2018-cryptocurrency-crypto-news</feedburner:origLink></item></channel></rss>
